title: [Large-scale] VR-Based English Oral Proficiency Development Program

context.prior_knowledge: Basic English sentence construction skills and intermediate-level vocabulary/grammar knowledge
context.additional_context: Conducting context-specific conversation practice and assessments in virtual reality environments utilizing learners' personal devices (BYOD).

learning_goals: Learners can maintain natural English conversations for over 5 minutes through VR simulations
Learners can communicate appropriately using suitable vocabulary and expressions in various social contexts (interviews/travel/meetings)
Learners can improve pronunciation and grammar errors by over 30% based on VR feedback
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
